title: Perfecting The Odds
description: Bad luck is simply Karis Bennett’s reality.So when her husband confesses the deception that would lead to his untimely death, she takes that crap nugget square in the face, and it’s reeked ever since.That was until Michael Finn slides his sexy card into her crappy hand on one of the worst nights of her life, no less. But this time, it’s not only bad luck, but also bad timing that nearly destroys her chance at happiness. Fortunately, the most relentless man she’s ever met is more than willing to fight for the both of them.Appearing at the most inopportune times, Michael is her light amongst darkness. Passion amongst indifference. Perfection amongst misfortune. He gives her something she’s never had: a life worth living.
author: Brenna St. Clare
